sentence.Network_en: He curls up in a flatcar and watches the sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在一节平板车上蜷作一团、望着夜空.

sentence.Network_en: For this, should develop all sorts of container flatcar and through traffic car.
sentence.Network_cn: 为此, 应发展各种集装箱平车和联运车辆.

sentence.Network_en: Nowadays, the coal transportation of the railway generally used the flatcar in China.
sentence.Network_cn: 我国现阶段, 煤在铁路运输中一般都采用敞车运输.
